body:
Hi there, 
I often check the infractions page and I have seen a couple of people getting banned for "Regen" wich suprises me. I'm pretty sure the regen hack won't work on Avicus, neither they work on almost all the decent protected servers. Am I wrong? Do they work?  Please explain. (Correct me if I made any mistakes)


EDIT: I'm wrong! Thank you Nolan and Mooch! *^*

title: Regen hacks?

replies.body: Yes, they do work, some clients probably don't though.
replies.body_tagged: Yes, they do work, some clients probably don't though.

replies.body:
Most of the easy to obtain clients don't bypass the Avicus anti-hacking system.

Some do. I have seen blatant regen myself.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: Oh, okay.. dumb dumb me. Thanks for clarifying, Nolan! ^-^
